mainSequence.step: User reads the metainfo version of the file located at /dir1/file.txt
User gets the user version directory location from datasafe-directory
User obtains the DFS location of the latest directory (LATEST) from meta
User retrieves the content of /dir1/file.txt at LINK from datasafe-storage
User reads the content of the file at LINK (FILE) from meta
User receives the content of FILE
User gets the latest data in /dir1/file.txt from meta
